mapper.select: SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain', qs.fBearPawNumber AS 'bearPawNumber', qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup', qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup', qs.fType AS 'type', qs.fIgnoreNoIndex AS 'ignoreNoIndex', qs.fIgnoreNoOrder AS 'ignoreNoOrder', qs.fUpdateInterval AS 'updateInterval', qs.fUpdateStatus AS 'updateStatus', qs.fUpdateStartTime AS 'updateStartTime', qs.fUpdateEndTime AS 'updateEndTime', qs.fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime', qs.fCreateTime AS 'createTime', qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordCountTime AS 'captureCurrentKeywordCountTime', qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordStatus AS 'captureCurrentKeywordStatus' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE (qs.fUpdateStatus IS NULL OR qs.fUpdateEndTime IS NULL OR (qs.fUpdateStatus = 'Completed' AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL qs.fUpdateInterval DAY) > qs.fUpdateEndTime) OR (qs.fUpdateStatus = 'Processing' AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) > qs.fUpdateStartTime) OR (qs.fUpdateStatus = 'DownloadTimesUsed' AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) > qs.fUpdateEndTime) ) AND qs.fStatus = 1 AND ((qs.fPcGroup > '' AND qs.fPcKeywordExceedMaxCount = 0) OR (qs.fPhoneGroup > '' AND qs.fPhoneKeywordExceedMaxCount = 0)) AND qs.fAutoCrawlKeywordFlag IS TRUE ORDER BY qs.fUpdateEndTime

SELECT DISTINCT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain', qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup', qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup', qs.fType AS 'type', qs.fIgnoreNoIndex AS 'ignoreNoIndex', qs.fIgnoreNoOrder AS 'ignoreNoOrder', qs.fUpdateInterval AS 'updateInterval', qs.fUpdateStatus AS 'updateStatus', qs.fUpdateStartTime AS 'updateStartTime', qs.fUpdateEndTime AS 'updateEndTime', qs.fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime', qs.fCreateTime AS 'createTime', qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordCountTime AS 'captureCurrentKeywordCountTime', qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordStatus AS 'captureCurrentKeywordStatus' FROM t_qz_setting qs JOIN t_qz_operation_type qt ON qs.fUuid = qt.fQZSettingUuid WHERE qt.fUuid IN( SELECT qr.fQZOperationTypeUuid FROM t_qz_charge_rule qr ) AND qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordStatus IS NULL OR ( qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordStatus = 'Completed' AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 HOUR) > qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordCountTime ) OR ( qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordStatus = 'Processing' AND DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) > qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordCountTime ) AND qs.fStatus = 1 ORDER BY qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordCountTime

SELECT DISTINCT qs.fUuid AS "uuid", ot.fNextChargeDate AS "nextChargeDate" FROM t_qz_setting qs, t_qz_operation_type ot WHERE qs.fUuid = ot.fQZSettingUuid AND ot.fNextChargeDate <= date_add(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND ot.fIsDeleted = 0 AND qs.fStatus = 1

SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fCustomerUuid AS 'customerUuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain', qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup', qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup', qs.fType AS 'type', qs.fIgnoreNoIndex AS 'ignoreNoIndex', qs.fIgnoreNoOrder AS 'ignoreNoOrder', qs.fUpdateInterval AS 'updateInterval', qs.fUpdateStatus AS 'updateStatus', qs.fUpdateStartTime AS 'updateStartTime', qs.fUpdateEndTime AS 'updateEndTime', qs.fUpdateTime AS 'updateTime', qs.fCreateTime AS 'createTime', qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordCountTime AS 'captureCurrentKeywordCountTime', qs.fCaptureCurrentKeywordStatus AS 'captureCurrentKeywordStatus' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fUuid IN (#{uuids})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_qz_setting qs SET qs.fUpdateStatus = NULL, qs.fUpdateTime = NOW(), qs.fUpdateEndTime = NULL WHERE qs.fUuid IN (${uuids})
mapper.select: SELECT qz.fQZSettingUuid FROM ( SELECT qot.fQZSettingUuid, qot.fMaxKeywordCount FROM t_qz_operation_type qot LEFT JOIN t_customer_keyword ck ON qot.fGroup = ck.fOptimizeGroupName WHERE ck.fType = 'qz' AND ck.fTerminalType = #{operationType} AND ck.fStatus > 0 AND qot.fIsDeleted = 0 GROUP BY qot.fUuid HAVING COUNT(1) > qot.fMaxKeywordCount ) qz;

SELECT qs.fUuid AS 'uuid', qs.fDomain AS 'domain' FROM t_qz_setting qs LEFT JOIN t_customer c ON qs.fCustomerUuid = c.fUuid LEFT JOIN t_userinfo u ON c.fUserID = u.fLoginName WHERE u.fStatus = 0 AND (qs.fCrawlerStatus = 'new' OR (qs.fCrawlerStatus = 'processing' AND qs.fCrawlerTime <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE)) OR qs.fCrawlerTime IS NULL OR (qs.fCrawlerStatus = 'finish' AND qs.fCrawlerTime <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL #{crawlerHour} HOUR)) ) AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM t_qz_keyword_rank_info qk WHERE qk.fQZSettingUuid = qs.fUuid AND qk.fWebsiteType <> 'designationWord') ORDER BY qs.fCreateTime DESC LIMIT #{taskNumber}
mapper.update:
update t_qz_setting SET fCrawlerStatus = 'processing', fCrawlerTime = NOW() WHERE fUuid IN
#{uuid}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_customer_keyword ck LEFT JOIN t_qz_setting qs ON qs.fCustomerUuid = ck.fCustomerUuid WHERE qs.fUuid = #{qzSettingSearchGroupInfoCriteria.qzSettingUuid} AND ck.fStatus = 1 AND ck.fTerminalType = #{qzSettingSearchGroupInfoCriteria.terminalType} AND ck.fOptimizeGroupName LIKE '${qzSettingSearchGroupInfoCriteria.optimizeGroupName}%'

SELECT
qs.fPcGroup AS 'groupName'
qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'groupName'
FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fStatus = 1
AND qs.fPcGroup > ''
AND qs.fPhoneGroup > ''
AND qs.fPcGroup LIKE '${groupSettingCriteria.optimizedGroupName}%'
AND qs.fPhoneGroup LIKE '${groupSettingCriteria.optimizedGroupName}%'
GROUP BY
qs.fPcGroup
qs.fPhoneGroup

SELECT qs.fGroupMaxCustomerKeywordCount AS 'groupMaxCustomerKeywordCount',
qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup'
qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup'
FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE qs.fCustomerUuid = #{customerUuid} AND qs.fDomain LIKE '%${url}'
AND qs.fPcGroup > ''
AND qs.fPhoneGroup > ''
mapper.update: UPDATE t_qz_setting qs SET qs.fUpdateTime = NOW(), qs.fIsMonitor = 1 WHERE qs.fUuid IN (${uuids})
mapper.select: SELECT qs.fSearchEngine AS 'searchEngine', qs.fPcGroup AS 'pcGroup', qs.fPhoneGroup AS 'phoneGroup' FROM t_qz_setting qs WHERE 1 = 1 AND qs.fCustomerUuid = #{customerUuid} AND qs.fDomain = #{domain}
mapper.update:
UPDATE t_qz_setting SET fUpdateTime = NOW(), fRenewalStatus = #{renewalStatus}, fStatus = #{renewalStatus} WHERE fUuid IN
#{item}
AND fRenewalStatus = 0
AND fRenewalStatus = 1
